settings.text: Are you looking to invest in an industrial fiber metal-cutting machine without financial pressure? Here at OMTech, we acknowledge and understand that acquiring a fiber laser cutting machine can be a big financial investment for a lot of businesses. That being said, we have teamed up with First Citizen Bank to offer the best financing options available to our customers. With loaning options of up to $1 million, you can rest assured to have enough capital to invest in the metal-cutting machine of your dreams without a hefty initial investment.
